channel.title: Eclipse 639 nex problem
channel.description: Hey there . I killed nex in that source and it dont respawn? i dont know what to do please help im confused. :confused: Coding this server first time but anyways waiting for some answers.

item.title: Eclipse 639 nex problem
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

It doesn’t matter if tis a gravedig, many a time I’ve searched for something and the question has been unanswered and many a time it has been answered so it has helped me. So your helping more people than you know probably.

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse 639 nex problem
item.dc:creator: @shadowseth12 shadowseth12
item.description:
@shadowseth12 wrote:

I know I’m probably grave digging but any way if more people come into this problem they can have the answer.

Go into your server folder, and search “unrespawnable” and the file NPC.java should come up in the results. Right click “edit” or “edit with notepad++”. Hit Ctrl+f and search for it yet again. It should say:
public static final int[] UNRESPAWNABLE_NPCS = {

From the list of numbers it has inside these brackets, remove 13447,13448, etc.

Save, then compile.

Read full topic
